nav.betaDetails: Project Whale is in beta. Contact Lin with any issues.

a11y.page: Page {{page}} of {{pages}}. Page navigation on bottom of page.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.updateInfo: These data are synchronized with the school portal. Please contact school administrators to update your information.

balance.title: Balance
balance.balanceInfo: Balance is non-refundable. You can hold up to ¥{{max}} at a time.

rechargeModal.title: Recharge
rechargeModal.message: Please enter the amount you would like to recharge. Balance is non-refundable.

points.title: Points
points.pointsInfo: You can earn points with every purchase. Points can be used to redeem rewards.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.smsInfo: You will not receive SMS notifications if you did not authorize in OneLogin.

others.title: Others
others.credits: Project Whale is developed with a collaboration between WebArtistry and Whale Cafe. Thank you to all contributors.

orders.title: Orders
orders.empty: You have no orders yet. Fancy a drink?

types.balanceTransaction: {{user}} recharged their balance with ¥{{v0}}. Weixin Pay transaction ID: {{v1}}.
types.balanceUsed: {{user}} used balance ¥{{v0}} to pay for order {{order}}. New balance: ¥{{v1}}.
types.pointsUpdated: {{user}}'s points is updated by {{v0}}. New points: {{v1}}.
types.orderPaymentSuccess: Order {{order}} (¥{{v1}}) is paid successfully by user {{user}} with {{v0}}.
types.orderPaymentFailed: Order {{order}} (¥{{v1}}) payment failed by user {{user}} with {{v0}}.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.empty: No notifications yet. You've reached inbox zero!

types.orderRefunded: Order {{order}} (¥{{v0}}) has been refunded. You will receive the refund within 14 working days from your payment method.
types.payLaterReminder: Your Pay Later order {{order}} hasn't been paid for yet.

settings.title: Settings
settings.minValue: The value must be at least {{min}}.
settings.maxValue: The value must be at most {{max}}.
settings.unsavedAccessibility: You can save at the bottom of the page.
settings.hasErrors: You must resolve errors before saving.

descriptions.enable-scheduled-availability: When this setting is turned on, the store opens on a schedule instead of manually.
descriptions.weekdays-only: Only open the store from Monday to Friday.
descriptions.store-open: When this setting is turned on, the store is open.
descriptions.maximum-cups-per-order: The maximum amount of cups a user can order in one order.
descriptions.maximum-cups-per-day: The maximum amount of cups that can be processed in a day. The user will be unable to place orders when this amount is reached. There may be a slight overflow when Maximum Cups Per Order is not 1.
descriptions.maximum-balance: The maximum balance users can hold, in CN¥.
descriptions.balance-recharge-minimum: The minimum amount users can recharge, in CN¥.

users.title: Users
users.name: Name
users.permissionsOwn: You can't change your own permissions.

pointsModal.title: Edit Points
pointsModal.message: Please enter the new points value.

today.refundInfo: Do not refund over 5 orders per week. That may cause issues with Weixin Pay.

refundModal.title: Are you sure?
refundModal.message: Do not refund over 5 orders per week. That may cause issues with Weixin Pay.
refundModal.messageCash: Refunding cash requires manual operation. Please confirm with the user before proceeding.
refundModal.messageBalance: The refund will enter the user's balance immediately.
refundModal.messageWeChat: The refund will return to the user's Weixin Pay account in up to 14 working days.
